original_title: Sports Minister meets with ICC CEO
original_body_lines: Chief Executive Officer of the International Cricket Council (ICC) Geoff Allardice met with Minister of Sports and Youth Affairs Harin Fernando on Wednesday (10 Jan.).
The two parties had a constructive discussion on the current state of cricket in Sri Lanka, and a way forward for Sri Lanka Cricket (SLC), Minister Harin said in a post on ‘X’ (formerly Twitter).
He further noted that the ICC CEO is due to meet President Ranil Wickremesinghe today (10 Jan.).
